description: In a world of new security challenges & economic uncertainties, BRICS stands as a beacon of peace, potential & promise: PM Modi We should set ourselves a target to double intra-BRICS to US Do
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Chaired the BRICS 2016 Plenary Meet & talked about sustaining the strong momentum of intra-BRICS engagement.
